metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9584 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
libical allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(use-after-free) and possibly read heap memory via a crafted ics file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9584` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libical3 - 3.0.1-5
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libical: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
libical3 package in esm-infra/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.1-5').
